topic.title: Modes of Operation for the STS or STS/PDU System

body.p:
The four available modes of operation are:
Normal mode - the STS operate per the above listed description
Remote Operator Interface mode – the operating of the STS is transferred to the remote panel with LED indicators and toggle switches.
Bypass - The WaveStar STS unit/system is equipped with Bypass MCCBs or MCSWs so that the unit can be placed in a configuration where the logic can be disconnected. This action requires the operator to toggle Kirk Keys and bypass breakers/switches to the desired source. Information on operation of this is found later in the manual and there is also information through the Help Screen to perform the Bypass operation.
Maintenance mode – the STS Unit is equipped with a Maintenance Bypass switch to bypass the logic for clearing of certain faults without taking the unit to Bypass. Consult with Eaton Customer Support prior to using this mode.
